text:
Hotel jaringan dari Swiss Bell rasanya tidak perlu diragukan lagi kualitas service yang ditawarkan, for me personally...it's always gonna be my number one choice everywhere I go.

Kunjungan saya ke Luwuk yang pertama kali saya memilih untuk menginap di Swis Bellinn, selain karena rekomendasi dari teman-teman saya, juga karena saya lebih yakin memilih hotel yang memang sudah saya kenal kualitasnya.

Tidak salah, Swis Bellinn Luwuk memang spot yang tepat jika akan liburan di Luwuk, setiap kamar memiliki terrace yang menghadap ke pantai Luwuk sehingga sunset atau sunrise selalu bisa dinikmati dari kamar masing-masing, selain itu memang pemandangannya yang drop-dead gorgeous. Kamarnya bersih, amenities & toiletries lengkap, pilihan channel TV lenngkap.

Untuk menu breakfast sangat banyak variasi pilihan, as in any Swis Bell hotel network, so always satisfied with it. Staf juga sangat membantu, dan di Swis Bellinn ini juga terdapat kedai Gelato yang cukup populer di Luwuk.

So all in all, jika anda akan ke Luwuk, memilih Swiss Bellinn akan menjadi pilihan yang tidak akan anda sesali.

text: This place just opened and they are trying their best to make it a top notch hotel.  The location is stunning, up on the hillside overlooking the bay.  Luwuk is scattered along the shoreline, curving away to the east.  The hotel is quite nicely built and designed with lots of views and open areas and the restaurant is a beautiful place to sit and enjoy a long lunch.  The pool is decent sized and has a nice view as well.  The staff has been collected from all over Indonesia and they are obviously a bit bored because once they found out I spoke Indonesian, I always had a friend at meal time and they were more than eager to help me whenever I needed something.  The gym is basic but also has a stunning view south out over the bay.  It's not very convenient for exploring the city but they do have a shuttle but it is very near the airport so the drive is very short and they have a free shuttle as well.  I hope they can maintain these standards.  Currently, they have a contract with a large mainland Chinese group that stays there associated with some mining project and at times, these fellows can dominate the place and the facilities.  they are not rude, but there can be quite a lot of them.
title: Hide away in luxury

text:
We've stayed at Swiss-Belinn Luwuk twice and are absolutely convinced that there's no better option in Luwuk. Our first stay in march 2018 was perfect so we booked it again for october. Rooms are modern business style, including all amenities needed, well cleaned as the whole property. Big bonus is their free airport shuttle and the free scheduled transport service to the city and back. This time we were traveling with friends and one had an injury from a jellyfish which started to get infected so we asked the reception for a doctor. We were a bit worried as our friend's constitution got very bad within an hour. They were super helpful, extremely supporting and immediately organized a car for us who brought us to a 24 h medical center. The driver waited there for us, drove us afterwards to an ATM and offered a drive around the city. We were not charged for it and positively surprised by such an individual service. A very special thanks to the wonderful lady at reception, she was just so amazing and made our day.
Termin kasih banyak !!!!
title: Highly recommended

text:
It's my 2nd time staying here for my business trips. I do enjoy my stay at Swiss Belinn Luwuk. I always think that this hotel is really underrated as a 3 star hotel, I would rate it as at least 4 star resort.

This hotel makes me like I'm on vacation trip. Hotel location have really great view toward the city with its mountains background and the ocean.
The rooms has good design with balcony facing the pool. And the pool is nice and clean. Even if you plan to staying here for your business trip I would recommend you to bring your swim gear and try the pool.

What is really surprised me is the friendly and humble staff, they all tend to remember your name, observe what you usually order at the restaurant like: I just need to tell them once to separate the sugar from my coffee and they will remember it every time I order my coffee or tea. That's really "wow" me. 
They have a free airport pick up service, drivers are friendly and professional.
Seriously not a single staff that ever failed me. Kudos to all the staff at Swiss Belinn hotel Luwuk.

Definitely would recommend this hotel to everyone and I can't wait to get another assignment from my office for "workcation" at Luwuk again and of course will choose this hotel.

Oh, one more. Everytime I posted photo of this hotel on my social media network, all my friend are thinking that I'm on oversea vacation trip not in Indonesia.
title: Workcation Vibes

text:
I stayed in Swiss Belinn for three nights during a weekend in Luwuk. The greetings that we have and the way staff treated us were very corteous, It is one of the best hotel in Indonesia in terms of staff courtesy, and I travelled a lot. The breakfast food is quite varied an the view from our balcony is excellent. 
However still there are some things to improve. As for the night, I suggest to limit the time for people to sing along in the restaurant as it is a bit disturbing. Anf the amenities in the room like shower gel should be added daily when it is nearing empty. We were a  bit surprised as well when a staff tried to open the door without knocking. I think the staff should at least knock the door.
title: Excellent service with room for improvement

Nous avons passé une nuit en aout 2018 dans cet hotel, en transit en attente d'un vol pour Manado.
L'hotel est neuf, très moderne, d'un confort "reposant' après un voyage de qq semaines en itinérant aux Sulawesi :-)
Le personnel est très serviable et parle anglais.
La vue est très belle et la piscine superbe.
Seul (petit) bémol, les prix des repas et boissons sont un peu surévalués par rapport à la qualité meme si le petit déjeuner est très sympa.
Une bonne adresse à Luwuk
